newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech HN-Wood index rises 13 points to 1,678 pts.
newsitem.headline: Czech HN-Wood index rises 13 points to 1,678 pts.

text.p: The HN-Wood index, measuring the 60 most capitalised issues on the Prague Stock Exchange, on Thursday rose 13 points, or 0.78 percent, to 1,678 points, the brokerage house Wood & Company said.
